pr_title: HBASE-25002 Create simple pattern matching query for retrieving metri…

timeline.message: HBASE-25002 Create simple pattern matching query for retrieving metrics matching the pattern

timeline.author: anoopsjohn

replies.bodyText: I changed it so that later we can debug it to know what is the query. Generally setting debug level is what we do for debugging so I just changed it. I can revert it if needed.
replies.author: ramkrish86

replies.bodyText: Ok to change. Can u also change to use {} format log line. Anyways that will be nice to have
replies.author: anoopsjohn

timeline.bodyText: You can avoid this boolean. Just use String[] and check for null value and call diff write methods?
timeline.author: anoopsjohn

timeline.bodyText: We are compiling this pattern for each and every MBean attribute.  This will be costly. we could have compiled the attribute and kept that in an Array at 1st step itself (instead of keeping the regex patterns in String[])
timeline.author: anoopsjohn

replies.bodyText: Ya ok . I did not do it thinking we are not doing this thing much often. May be once a while. I can change it though.
replies.author: ramkrish86

timeline.bodyText: Infact u can see we dont need such if else, end of the day we call same writeAttribute which is having Pattern[] arg and we have null check there anyways.
timeline.author: anoopsjohn

timeline.bodyText: Ya even this also not needed.
timeline.author: anoopsjohn
anoopsjohn
